'''Comfey''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''キュワワー''' ''Cuwawa'') is a {{type|Fairy}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation VII]].

It is not known to [[Evolution|evolve]] into or from any other Pokémon.

==Biology==
Comfey is a small, light green Pokémon with several flowers surrounding it. Its main body has an orange face with oval, light green eyes. On top of its head is a long, fluffy green crest that curls slightly over its face and extends backwards. A thin blue thread is attached to the back of its head, and has several flowers attached to it. The flowers are white, purple, red, and yellow. Comfey usually holds the last flower in its two short arms. On either side of the main crest is a smaller, pale yellow tuft.

This Pokémon stretches sticky vines from its head to pick flowers to create the ring around itself, and will give these rings to those it likes. Without flowers, it feels uneasy. The flowers can also be thrown at enemy Pokémon to create an opening to either flee or attack. Comfey spreads oil from its body along its flower ring. The oil changes the flower so they emit a soothing fragrance that affects both Comfey and its allies. This aroma can also help with the treatment of people and Pokémon at hospitals.<ref>http://www.pokemon-sunmoon.com/en-us/pokemon/comfey/</ref>

Comfey is the [[signature move|only known Pokémon]] capable of learning the move {{m|Floral Healing}}.

==In the anime==
[[File:Nurse Joy Comfey.png|thumb|left|250px|Comfey in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
===Major appearances===
====[[Nurse Joy's Comfey]]====
[[Nurse Joy]] in the [[Alola]] [[region]] are assisted by Comfey and {{TP|Nurse Joy|Blissey}}. Nurse Joy's Comfey debuted in ''[[SM004|First Catch in Alola, Ketchum-Style!]]''.

===Minor appearances===
Multiple wild Comfey appeared in ''[[SM020|Partner Promises!]]''.

Three Comfey appeared at [[Aether Paradise]] in ''[[SM046|Deceiving Appearances!]]'', with two appearing during a fantasy. One of them appeared again in a video in ''[[SM049|Mission: Total Recall!]]''.

==In the manga==
[[File:Comfey Adventures.png|thumb|left|170px|Comfey in [[Pokémon Adventures]]]]
===In the Pokémon Adventures manga===
Comfey first appeared in [[PASM02]], where one was placed around {{adv|Moon}}'s neck by a {{tc|Dancer}}. She is immediately startled by it as {{adv|Sun}} laughs from her reaction, commenting that he also thought that it was a lei when he first came to [[Alola]].

Three Ally Comfey appeared to help a [[Totem Pokémon|Totem]] {{p|Lurantis}} fight against {{adv|Moon}} in the {{chap|Sun & Moon}}.

A Comfey appeared in the {{chap|Sun & Moon}} inside the [[Aether Paradise]].

==Trivia==
* Comfey is the only Pokémon in the {{egg|Grass}} [[Egg Group]] that is not a {{Type|Grass}}.
* Comfey is tied with {{p|Joltik}}, {{p|Flabébé}}, {{p|Cutiefly}} and {{p|Cosmoem}} as the [[List of Pokémon by height|smallest]] Pokémon.

===Origin===
Comfey appears to be a living {{wp|lei (garland)|lei}}.

====Name origin====
Comfey may be a combination of ''comfy'', ''comfort'', ''{{wp|comfrey}}'', ''fey'', and ''lei''.

Cuwawa may be a combination of ''cure'', 輪 ''wa'' (ring), and フラワー ''furawā'' (flower).
